Title: NumericUpDown
Description:
An NumericUpDown control that demonstrates a clean and clear way to implement this common control:
1. It uses an attached behavior to do regex input validation
2. It supports decimal places and 1000 number groups
3. It supports keyboard keys: Up/Down/Ctrl-Up/Ctrl-Down for small/large changes
4. It supports databinding
5. It's lookless
